item.title: About
item.description: Hey! I’m Rahul. Currently, I’m a senior at California High School, San Ramon. I’ll be a freshman at Cal Poly SLO this fall. I’m fascinated by mathematics, computer science, robotics, and the connections between the three. When I’m not using a computer, I like to write poetry, learn foreign languages, shoot photos on film, and play the Indian classical flute––the bansuri. At a party, you’ll find me talking to anyone who’ll lend an ear.

item.title: Further Comments: A pleasure to teach [POEM]
item.description: A pleasure to teach reads my report card every year a smiley face, as if this is favorable A pleasure to teach means validation from mama and baba A pleasure to teach means my anxiety is invalid because “you did so well in school!” A pleasure to teach tells me i’m not fun A pleasure to teach means i shouldn’t try A pleasure to teach tells me i’m not smart
